data.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
data.openingCrawl: It is a period of civil war. The Rebel Alliance has won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire. During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire's ultimate weapon, the DEATH STAR...
data.producer: Kathleen Kennedy, Allison Shearmur, Simon Emanuel

data.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
data.openingCrawl: Board the Millennium Falcon and journey to a galaxy far, far away in Solo: A Star Wars Story, an all-new adventure...
data.producer: Kathleen Kennedy, Allison Shearmur, Simon Emanuel
